question: Who has been named as the best central bank governor in Asia-Pacific for 2018?
explanation: Ravi Menon, an Indian-origin banker in Singapore has been named as the best central bank governor in Asia-Pacific for 2018 by the leading UK-based magazine \'The Banker\' for his contribution in the makeover of Singapore\'s financial system. He is the managing director of Singapore\'s central bank Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS).
